frame.name: Activity_prepare
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">The troops</fex> were <t>preparing</t> <fex name="Agent">themselves</fex> <fex name="Activity">for the mission</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">The boats</fex> are <t>getting</t> <t>ready</t> <fex name="Activity">to leave the pier</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> is preparing.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>Thsi FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> with which an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifes the length of <fen>Time</fen> during which an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is used for the <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing the actor or undergoer of an action.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the amount of preparation the Agent puts into an activity. </def-root>

FE.name: Beneficiary
FE.definition: <def-root>This extrathematic FE applies to participants that derive a benefit from the occurrence of the event specified by the target predicate. Further, the target predicate should involve some sort of Agent that intends that the benefit go to the Beneficiary.</def-root>

FE.name: Iterations
FE.definition: <def-root>The frame element <fex name="Iterations">Iterations</fex> is used for expressions that indicate the number of times an event or state (of the kind denoted by the target in its clause) has taken place or held.</def-root>

FE.name: Event_description
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the state of affairs denoted by the target as role fillers in other frames. The state of affairs reported by the target is understood to play a role in the state of affairs of the modifier. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: prepare.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make ready for use or consideration, or make or get ready to do or deal with something.

lexUnit.name: ready.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to get ready (for an activity).

lexUnit.name: fix.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: prepare to perform an activity

lexUnit.name: rally.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: bring or come together for concerted action.

lexUnit.name: gear up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: make ready or prepare for activity.

lexUnit.name: preparation.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or process of preparing or being prepared.

lexUnit.name: compose.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: Make oneself ready for further action or perception.
